articles.description: Epic Games has announced the Fortnite Short Nite Film Festival which will debut 12 acclaimed animated films in Party Royale mode.
articles.content: Fortnite is popular for its various open stage events, concerts and virtual parties. The regular events keep the Fortnite audience entertained even outside of the basic game. The Marshmello concert, … [+2368 chars]
